timeline.message: guard recomputeSize from out of bounds exception

timeline.bodyText: Probably worth a comment about why this particular random number. If it is to trip the problem, can we somehow assert that it tripped with this number? I feel like we could easily end up in a position where the test doesn't do anything if we don't have some package private method to check to see if this thing happened somehow.
timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: The only condition to trigger it is to add one value to one bucket. I change it to a random long.
